scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-gtimeline.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && es6-arrow-function build/d3-gtimeline.js | uglifyjs -c -m -o build/d3-gtimeline.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-gtimeline.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-gtimeline.js build/d3-gtimeline.min.js
